AvD.synopsis: Daisy reacts to whichever route we took to learn that the tadpoles are imbued with special magic. They tell us that it’s part of a greater sickness. The Cult of the Absolute is winning a war nobody is aware of - if they are victorious we will all be doomed. But we can stop this if we join Daisy in the quest to bring down the Absolute. We need to use our powers to infiltrate the ranks. At the end of the dream, Daisy gives us a new tadpole power.
AvD.how_to_trigger: Have at least one companion in your partyGot to act 1 Queue camp nightLong rest

AvD_79.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_79.context: CinematicNodeContext: We come to, in the dream field. Daisy is there, back to us. They turn to speak to us.NodeContext: Daisy turns to face player on her left

AvD_19.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_19.text: Don't worry - I have things under control. For now.
AvD_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player glances towards where battle was happening. Daisy clocks player's glance. NodeContext: Daisy facing player

AvD_40.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_40.text: I see you've been using the powers the tadpole gives you - good.

AvD_17.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_17.text: And you haven't tried to have it removed.

AvD_12.speaker: Player
AvD_12.text: I never want to live in the darkness again.

AvD_89.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_89.text: And you will never have to, if you listen to me.

AvD_82.speaker: Player
AvD_82.text: I'm worried I'll go mad if I take it out.

AvD_107.speaker: Player
AvD_107.text: I trusted that you would protect me.

AvD_47.speaker: Player
AvD_47.text: It might not be the worst thing, to become a mind flayer.

AvD_16.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_16.text: You are open-minded - a good quality to have.

AvD_8.speaker: Player
AvD_8.text: I couldn't find anyone who could help me.

AvD_54.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_54.text: It would have made little difference if you had.

AvD_32.speaker: Player
AvD_32.text: If it doesn't transform me, what's the harm in keeping it around?

AvD_68.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_68.text: It may not transform you immediately, but it's only a matter of time.

AvD_105.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_105.text: But things haven't gone as you expected.
AvD_105.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy clocks our uncertain reaction.

AvD_38.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_38.text: You hoped a druid as powerful as Halsin might be able to remove your tadpole. But he couldn't.

AvD_73.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_73.text: You hoped the fey magic of the hag might be enough to remove your tadpole. But it wasn't.

AvD_76.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_76.text: You thought a mind flayer might know how to extricate one of its own from you, but Omeluum couldn't help you. Your tadpole lives.

AvD_88.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_88.text: You thought Nettie might be able to help you in the druids' grove. But all she did was try to kill you.

AvD_15.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_15.text: You thought Nettie might be able to help you in the druids' grove. But all she did was reaffirm the danger.

AvD_100.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_100.text: You're desperate to be rid of it. Understandable, but you're looking for solutions in the wrong places.

AvD_20.speaker: Player
AvD_20.text: So what should I be doing?

AvD_66.speaker: Player
AvD_66.text: I don't care about the tadpole. I have been offered a greater power by my butler.

AvD_91.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_91.text: Ambition is good. You are resourceful and will gather many allies to aid your strength. Use them how you will.

AvD_74.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_74.text: But whatever you do, a word of advice: do not listen to that false butler.

AvD_50.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_50.text: He knows nothing of what the tadpole is capable of.

AvD_60.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_60.text: It's complicated. But I'm an adventurer, just like you.

AvD_4.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_4.text: Just like you, I was infected with a mind flayer parasite. Just like you, I seek to be free of it.

AvD_59.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_59.text: But to do that, we'll need to think beyond local healers.

AvD_10.speaker: Player
AvD_10.text: Halsin mentioned that these tadpoles have been modified with magic.

AvD_58.speaker: Player
AvD_58.text: Auntie Ethel mentioned there was Netherese magic involved.

AvD_72.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_72.text: The hag did not deceive you on this front.

AvD_6.speaker: Player
AvD_6.text: Omeluum mentioned some sort of strange magic preventing the tadpole from being removed - what do you know about that?

AvD_43.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_43.text: You needed to see for yourself. And now you have.

AvD_103.speaker: Player
AvD_103.text: There must be some way to get rid of the tadpole.

AvD_21.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_21.text: There is. But you'll need to think beyond local healers.

AvD_18.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_18.text: Your parasite is unusual - it is wrapped in magic that prevents its removal.

AvD_102.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_102.text: Until the source of the tadpole's magic is destroyed, any attempt to remove it will kill you.

AvD_42.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_42.text: You were lucky that you only lost an eye. You could have lost much more.

AvD_55.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_55.text: The parasites are merely a symptom of a greater sickness in Faerûn.

AvD_75.speaker: Player
AvD_75.text: How do I destroy the source of the tadpole's magic?

AvD_25.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_25.text: I am not sure, yet. To find the answers, we must first find the source.

AvD_86.speaker: Player
AvD_86.text: I thought you said you could protect me?

AvD_64.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_64.text: From transforming into a mind flayer, yes. But that is not the only thing these parasites can do.

AvD_41.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_41.text: The Absolute's aims are not yet clear to me. But its progress towards domination is clear.

AvD_61.speaker: Player
AvD_61.text: How do you know so much about these tadpoles?

AvD_11.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_11.text: I have kept a careful watch on the movements of the cult. Though the Absolute's aims are not yet clear to me, its methods are.

AvD_98.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_98.text: These parasites are more than illithid spawn - they are vessels for control.

AvD_92.speaker: Player
AvD_92.text: Tell me more about this magic.

AvD_90.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_90.text: It imbues the parasites with special powers. Some that benefit, most that harm.

AvD_48.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_48.text: But more importantly, it enables the hosts to be controlled.

AvD_34.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_34.text: The infected hear the voice of the Absolute, and believe it to be a god.

AvD_45.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_45.text: You witnessed it yourself with Priestess Gut.

AvD_99.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_99.text: That is how the cult of the Absolute is spreading.

AvD_77.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_77.text: The highest of their rank - the True Souls - carry a tadpole just like yours. It is how they receive their orders. It is what makes them obey.

AvD_63.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_63.text: The highest of their rank are called True Souls. They carry a tadpole just like yours. It is how they receive their orders. It is what makes them obey.

AvD_65.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_65.text: When the order to transform is given, it will not be a matter of days - they will be mind flayers in an instant.

AvD_69.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_69.text: Were it not for my protection, so would you.

AvD_39.speaker: Player
AvD_39.text: My mind tells me to do foul things. Are you sure your protection is working?

AvD_0.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_0.text: I protect you from becoming a mind flayer - I cannot protect you from yourself.

AvD_110.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_110.text: But I know what it is like to be burdened by forces outside of your control.

AvD_35.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_35.text: We are alike, you and I.

AvD_44.speaker: Player
AvD_44.text: How is it that you protect me?

AvD_71.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_71.text: I have powers of my own, unique powers. But know that we are alike.

AvD_30.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_30.text: Because I am just like you. And I need an ally.

AvD_81.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_81.text: I've been trying to escape from this evil for a long time. Once, I almost succeeded.

AvD_13.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_13.text: Now, through you, I've been given a new chance. You can go where I cannot. And I can protect you from that evil.

AvD_112.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_112.text: If we work together, we may turn this around.

AvD_9.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_9.text: Hells. They need me. I have to go.
AvD_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Daisy reacts to thunder and a flash of lightning in the background. The Orpheus screams as the conflict intensifies.NodeContext: Daisy looks to her right at the battle field

AvD_33.speaker: Player
AvD_33.text: What is going on over there?

AvD_53.speaker: Player
AvD_53.text: Is there anything I can do to help you?

AvD_97.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_97.text: No. I can handle this. For now.

AvD_26.speaker: Player
AvD_26.text: Tell me where I can find you.

AvD_3.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_3.context: NodeContext: urgent No! Before calming back down to rational explanation

AvD_31.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_31.text: The power I use to protect you, I stole it from someone. They want it back.

AvD_101.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_101.text: I will hold them off for as long as I can, but sooner or later I will be worn down.

AvD_67.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_67.text: You must discover the source of the magic that controls the parasites before that happens.

AvD_52.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_52.text: The cultists are gathering at Moonrise Towers.

AvD_24.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_24.text: Follow the cultists' trail - they will lead you to their masters.

AvD_84.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_84.text: Use the powers your parasite gives you to convince them you are one of them. And when you find the source of their magic, destroy it.

AvD_95.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_95.text: Go. Our freedom depends on it.
AvD_95.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Daisy places a hand above your forehead. A brief glow. (New tadpole powers.) 

Then the player wakes.NodeContext: Daisy gently raise up her hand and gesture (Star Wars Jedi Mind Trick)

AvD_1.speaker: Player
AvD_1.text: Wait, what do you need me to do?

AvD_27.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_27.text: Because we share a common cause and a common enemy.

AvD_80.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_80.text: We share a common cause and a common enemy. Allegiances have been built on less.

AvD_70.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_70.text: Just like Nettie told you in the grove.

AvD_108.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_108.text: You were lucky that Omeluum realised this before he attempted a fatal extraction.

AvD_111.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_111.text: You were lucky that Halsin knew this. His instincts are right.

AvD_78.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
AvD_78.text: You haven't been using the parasite's power. You think you don't need it.
